For many topics in this class, we are going to be only scratching the surface. Below you can find some links that can help you learn more.

-   [Git, GitHub, and Version Control](https://www.crumplab.com/psyc3470/compendium/version_control.html) by Matt Crump

-   [Learning Statistics with R](https://learningstatisticswithr.com/book/) by Danielle Navarro

-   [ggplot2: Elegant Graphics for Data Analysis](https://ggplot2-book.org/) by Hadley Wickham, Danielle Navarro, and Thomas Lin Pedersen
